thread.title: Great location and excellent value
thread.title_full: Great location and excellent value - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ellenh322
title: Great location and excellent value
text: Perfectly situated for exploring Londons East End. 5 mins from The Tower of London, Whitechapel and Ripper and Krays Twins stomping grounds. Brick Lanes vibrant markets and massive choice of excellent Curry Houses and only a couple of minutes walk from choice of 2 underground stations. Highly recommended and we will visit again.
